title: Wild West Music Tracks
description: This original music package features a country background inspired by the Wild West. It includes 10 high-quality tracks and 50+ loops
longDescription:
This original music package features a country background inspired by the Wild West. It includes 10 high-quality tracks and 64 loops and short tracks recorded in our studio. Each track offers various HQ original loops, melodies, and progressions, providing enhanced flexibility for use during different stages of programming. The tracks are meticulously composed to ensure a wide range of variations, gradually increasing in intensity, suspense, and dynamics. This allows the same track to be used in multiple ways in a single scenario or play mode, providing the appropriate dynamics tailored to the desired application.


LISTEN ALL TRACKS (Soundcloud)



Track List:


  • Your Soul (orig. single track - main track) - 2.55
  • Night Hunt (orig. single track + 6 loops, tracks) - 3.38
  • Currahee (orig. single track + 11 loops, tracks) - 1.45
  • The dawn of the night (orig. single track + 6 loops, tracks) - 1.35
  • The Wolf’s Cry (orig. single track + 9 loops, tracks) - 1.32
  • Night March (orig. single track + 6 loops, tracks) - 3.38
  • The Ambush (orig. single track + 5 loops, tracks) - 3.24
  • Train Chase (orig. single track + 7 loops, tracks) - 3.17
  • Manhunt (orig. single track + 8 loops, tracks) - 1.33
  • Duel at noon (orig. single track + 6 loops, tracks) - 3.05



Loops description:


The loops have the same format as the main tracks; average duration for a loop: 30s. Each loop has its own BPM and pitch. The loops are taken from the source track at varying moments of intensity - dynamic, including both melodic and non-melodic elements. There are also rhythmic percussion loops and environmental background loops.
